title: The 100 Questions Challenge (2021 Edition)
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are taking the 100 Questions challenge. 100 questions to guess five mystery games. Can they do it? Play along and find out.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)
content:encoded: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are taking the 100 Questions challenge. 100 questions to guess five mystery games. Can they do it? Play along and find out.
